long_description: The STM Skinny 3 case offers a sleek design with great protection for the iPad(R) 3rd generation. Automatic on/off front cover wakes up the device and puts it to sleep when you open or close the case. Lightweight, slim and protective design offers comfortable and easy carrying; snap-in, hardshell back with soft lining provides protection from scratches and bumps. Device ports and control buttons remain easy to access; foldable front cover allows both typing or viewing mode. The STM Skinny 3 case features a loop closure for quick and easy access.
short_description: The STM Skinny 3 case offers a sleek design with great protection for the iPad(R) 3rd generation.
